Tyreek Hill Involved in Domestic Dispute with Wife
MIAMI Dolphins running back Tyreek Hill and his wife are on the brink of a divorce as tensions flared during a domestic dispute, according to reports. Police responded to a 911 call of an â€œassault in progressâ€ at Hillâ€˜s apartment high-rise in Sunny Isles Beach, Florida, about an hour north of Miami, on Monday afternoon. [â€¦]
